title: windows warning: Could not find pkg-config information for DL

content.raw:
From https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_common-ci-default-windows7-amd64/229/consoleFull:

~~~
-- Looking for libdl - found

CMake Warning (dev) at D:/Jenkins/workspace/ignition_common-ci-default-windows7-amd64/ws/install/lib/cmake/ignition-cmake0/cmake0/IgnUtils.cmake:265 (message):
   -- THIS MESSAGE IS INTENDED FOR IGNITION-COMMON AUTHORS --
      (IF YOU SEE THIS, PLEASE REPORT IT)

  Could not find pkg-config information for DL.  It was not provided by the
  find-module for the package, nor was it explicitly passed into the call to
  ign_find_package(~).  This is most likely an error in this project's use of
  ign-cmake.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:62 (ign_find_package)
This warning is for project developers.  Use -Wno-dev to suppress it.
~~~
